    D

    dao - package dao
     
    database - Variable in class dao.DataBaseConnector
     
    DataBaseConnector - Class in dao
    Handles the connection between the application and the MySQL database.
    DataBaseConnector() - Constructor for class dao.DataBaseConnector
    Constructs a new DataBaseConnector and establishes a connection to the database using the defined credentials.
    DataBaseController - Class in controller
    Controller responsible for managing database operations across different DAOs (UserDAO, ClientDAO, GameDAO, GameSessionDAO).
    DataBaseController(MainController, DatabaseManager) - Constructor for class controller.DataBaseController
    Creates a new DataBaseController and initializes the database connection.
    DatabaseManager - Class in dao
    Central manager class for database operations within the MVC architecture.
    DatabaseManager(ExceptionMessage) - Constructor for class dao.DatabaseManager
    Constructs a DatabaseManager with a reference to the exception handling system.
    dbConnection - Variable in class dao.DatabaseManager
     
    dbController - Variable in class controller.MainController
     
    dbController - Variable in class ui.ClientEditUI
     
    dbController - Variable in class ui.ManagementUI
     
    dbController - Variable in class ui.PlayUI
     
    dbController - Variable in class ui.StatsUI
     
    dbManager - Variable in class controller.DataBaseController
     
    dealCards(int, String) - Method in class model.Blackjack
    Deals a specified number of cards to a player or dealer.
    dealerCards - Variable in class model.Blackjack
     
    dealerShouldHit() - Method in class model.Blackjack
    Determines whether the dealer should hit (draw another card) based on Blackjack rules.
    deleteClient(int) - Method in class controller.DataBaseController
    Deletes a specific client.
    deleteClient(int, Connection) - Method in class dao.ClientDAO
    Deletes a client from the database by its ID.
    deleteClients() - Method in class controller.DataBaseController
    Deletes all clients linked to the current user.
    deleteClients(int, Connection) - Method in class dao.ClientDAO
    Deletes all clients linked to a specific user.
    deleteGame(int) - Method in class controller.DataBaseController
    Deletes a game from the database.
    deleteGame(int, Connection) - Method in class dao.GameDAO
    Deletes a specific game by its ID from the database.
    deleteGames() - Method in class controller.DataBaseController
    Deletes all games linked to the current user.
    deleteGames(int, Connection) - Method in class dao.GameDAO
    Deletes all games associated with a specific user.
    deleteGameSession(int, Connection) - Method in class dao.GameSessionDAO
    Deletes all game sessions associated with a specific user.
    deleteGameSessions() - Method in class controller.DataBaseController
    Deletes all game sessions linked to the current user.
    deleteUser(int) - Method in class controller.DataBaseController
    Deletes a user from the database.
    deleteUser(int, Connection) - Method in class dao.UserDAO
    Deletes a user from the database.
    disableRememberLogin() - Method in class controller.DataBaseController
    Disables the "remember login" flag for all users.
    disableRememberLogin(Connection) - Method in class dao.UserDAO
    Disables automatic login for all users.
